summary: This is an email chain between legal team members regarding the preparation and final review of an omnibus memorandum of law in opposition to Ghislaine Maxwell's motions. The discussion focuses on cite-checking, proofreading, and coordinating redactions before filing.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the legal motions being opposed; the memorandum of law is in opposition to her motions.

events.title: Preparation of opposition brief to Maxwell's motions
events.description: Legal team finalizes cite-checked omnibus memorandum of law in opposition to Ghislaine Maxwell's motions, coordinating review, proofreading, and redactions.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from February 26, 2021, among prosecutors/legal team members working on the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The team is preparing an omnibus memorandum of law in opposition to defense motions filed by Maxwell.
The email discusses coordination on cite-checking, proofreading, and applying redactions to the brief before filing.

Redactions are being carefully considered, with a principle to apply them to the subpoena and ex parte proceeding details, but not to descriptions of articles, general allegations in a brief, or the indictment.
